name: Erica
summary: Erica is a live-action immersive video game developed by Flavourworks and published by Sony Entertainment. The game was announced at PGW 2017. Release date is 19 August 2019. This wiki is a collaborative resource for the game and is maintained by the contributions of the fans.
info:
• 开发: Flavourworks
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: Interactive Thriller
  • 发行日期: 19 August 2019
